snippet: Many investors expect the market to be calm as 2013 comes to a close.
abstract: Stock market declines modestly as investors take breather from yearlong rally.
lead_paragraph: Many investors expect the market to be calm as 2013 comes to a close.

headline.main: Shares Slip as Investors Try to Polish Their Portfolios
